name: Altair Core Menu
description: A list of modules the Altair team recommends.

modules.name: liquidfire:Dates
modules.description: A lot of helpful date related property types (for Apollo) and utilities.

modules.name: liquidfire:Images
modules.description: Useful image rendering things (and image property type for Apollo).

modules.name: titan:Alfred
modules.description: Build yourself an Express powered website wicked fast using a clean MVC architecture. Hook into events inside of Altair from your controllers for some fun cross-media fun!

modules.name: liquidfire:Onyx
modules.description: Simple and clean rendering engine, plus the ability to create 'widgets'. Great fun when used with Alfred to create reusable visual components.
